paragraphs:
Edited By: Divya| 							Published By: Divya| 
							  Published: Oct 01, 2025, 09:39 PM (IST)

Before picking a budget laptop, check a few basics - processor, RAM, storage, and display size. Also think about your main use, which can be studying, office work, or entertainment. Once you check all the requirements, then simply go with the affordable option with best of the features and specs. To

Priced at Rs 14,990 on Amazon, the Primebook 2 Neo 2025 Gen 2 runs Android 15 (PrimeOS 3.0) with in-built AI. It features 6GB RAM, 128GB UFS 2.2 storage, and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G99 processor. The laptop has an 11.6-inch thin and light design with Type-C, USB, and MicroSD connectivity o

Priced at Rs 19,490 on Amazon, the Primebook 2 Max 2025 comes with a 15.6-inch Full HD IPS display and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G99 processor. It packs 8GB RAM, 256GB UFS storage, and runs Android 15 with PrimeOS 3.0. The laptop offers up to 12 hours of battery life, a backlit keyboard, and

Priced at Rs 10,990, the JioBook 11 is a lightweight laptop running on JioOS with a MediaTek 8788 octa-core processor. It offers 4GB RAM, 64GB eMMC storage, and an 11.6-inch display. Weighing just 990 grams, it is highly portable and supports dual-band Wi-Fi and 4G SIM connectivity.

Once you check all the requirements, then simply go with the affordable option with best of the features and specs. To help you, here are some options.

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: Priced at Rs 14,990 on Amazon, the Primebook 2 Neo 2025 Gen 2 runs Android 15 (PrimeOS 3.0) with in-built AI. It features 6GB RAM, 128GB UFS 2.2 storage, and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G99 processor. The laptop has an 11.6-inch thin and light design with Type-C, USB, and MicroSD connectivity options.
json_ld.name: Primebook 2 Neo 2025

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: Priced at Rs 19,490 on Amazon, the Primebook 2 Max 2025 comes with a 15.6-inch Full HD IPS display and is powered by the MediaTek Helio G99 processor. It packs 8GB RAM, 256GB UFS storage, and runs Android 15 with PrimeOS 3.0. The laptop offers up to 12 hours of battery life, a backlit keyboard, and in-built AI support.
json_ld.name: Primebook 2 Max 2025

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: Priced at Rs 10,990, the JioBook 11 is a lightweight laptop running on JioOS with a MediaTek 8788 octa-core processor. It offers 4GB RAM, 64GB eMMC storage, and an 11.6-inch display. Weighing just 990 grams, it is highly portable and supports dual-band Wi-Fi and 4G SIM connectivity.
json_ld.name: JioBook 11

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: The Lenovo SmartChoice Chromebook costs Rs 16,190 and runs on Chrome OS. It is powered by an Intel Celeron N4500 processor with 4GB RAM and 64GB eMMC storage. It features an 11.6-inch HD display, dual 2W stereo speakers, HD webcam, and weighs 1.21 kg.
json_ld.name: Lenovo SmartChoice Chromebook

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: On Flipkart, it costs Rs 16,999, which packs Intel Celeron Dual core processor and 8GB of RAM. It features a 15.6-inch display and weighs just 1.59Kg.
json_ld.name: Asus Chromebook

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: Priced at Rs 19,490 on Amazon, this budget laptop by Acer packs Intel Core Celeron N4500 Processor under the hood and gets 8GB RAM and 256GB of storage. It weighs just 1.5 KG and features 15.6-inch HD display.
json_ld.name: Acer SmartChoice Aspire 3 Laptop

json_ld.author: Divya
json_ld.description: If you need portability and basic browsing, go for smaller Chromebooks or the JioBook. For students who need Android apps and longer usage, Primebook models make sense. But if you want a bigger screen and ChromeOS features, Acer’s Chromebook is a better pick.

paragraphs: If you are thinking of buying a user-friendly laptop with good specifications on a low budget, i.e., less than Rs 20000, that can do all your daily tasks easily, then this blog is only for you.

In this blog, by analysing Indian marketing and taking expert opinion, we have selected for you the 5 best laptops under Rs 20,000 that can make your daily tasks easier. Apart from this, these five laptops have received excellent user ratings in the Indian market, and the build quality of these lapt
The Lenovo V15 laptop is a stylish laptop. It weighs only 1.7 kg, and its slim design allows it to fit comfortably in most bags, so you can easily take it anywhere.

This laptop has an anti-glare Full HD display that will provide stunning views. And for everyday tasks, it has Intel’s N4500 dual-core processor and 4 GB of DDR4 RAM, which can run multiple applications simultaneously without any lag.

Apart from this, this laptop has 256 GB of SSD storage, which is enough storage space to save your files, documents, and multimedia files. SSD storage not only provides faster boot time but also enhances the performance of the laptop.
